name: Not Nice Cat (Unique)
description:
You play as a not nice cat, which was thrown out of car because of his bad behavior. You need to survive doing bad things. 

Find out what happens to not nice cat. 

Features: 
  • challenging combat 
  • challenging parkour
  • nice pixel art graphics
  • attractive music 
Development

Game is developed to be submitted in Bored Pixels Game Jam (16 july to 23 july )

Game jam theme: You are not the hero

Interpretation: You play as evil character, you hurt, you steal, you kill. And you gain lives when you kill and steal. You survive doing bad things.

Game is Developed by Jazzberry Jammers team:

Design:

  • Jackdol

Programming:

  • Nadir Alishly - Unique
  • Drillu

Art:

  • Nadir Alishly - Unique
